Accelerators,

The first month of 2021 is over and we have had quite a month! We kicked off 2021 with our first published study and we enter into some new and exciting transitions ahead of us. To read more, check out this month's newsletter (https://psysciacc.org/news/2021-02-01_news-from-the-accelerator-january-2021.html). We look forward to seeing what else this year will bring.
